channel.title: ChronicleX - Re-birth
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://img687.imageshack.us/i/ejdkp1.png/][IMG]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/7106/ejdkp1.png[/img][/URL][/center]
I know i'll get flammed for doing this, but oh well.
So umm, as you may or may not know the re-birth of ChronicleX has begun. We've already bought the VPS and were already Webclient setup.
[size=10pt][b]Features[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Vps Hosted (24/7)[/li] [li]Active Staff[/li] [li]Tonnes of Monsters to battle against[/li] [li]Tonnes of Minigames to play![/li] [li]An epic on-growing Community[/li] [li]A hot Economy, fair and fun![/li] [li]Constant Updates[/li] [li]A great Thieveing System, 15-30-50k[/li] [li]Perfected Chaotic Weapons - Maul, LongSword and Staff[/li] [li]Perfected Pvp Armours and Weapons 100% working with effects[/li] [li]Perfected Dragon Claws 100% working with Special Attack[/li] [li]100% Curse Prayers with fully working effects like RuneScape[/li] [li]Sensationl Combat[/li] [li]Npc Freezing[/li] [li]Easy but fun training![/li] [li]Perfected Ep System for more of a Pking experience[/li][/ul]
[size=10pt][b]Minigames[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Barrows[/li] [li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Fight Pits[/li] [li]Fight Caves - Jad 1 wave[/li] [li]PestControl[/li] [li]Warriors Guild[/li][/ul]
[size=10pt][b]Bosses[/b][/size]
[ul][li]The almighty Barrelchester[/li] [li]GodWars[/li] [li]Corporal Beast[/li] [li]KingBlackDragon[/li] [li]Giant Mole, (Drops: Slayer Helmet, Dragon Hai, Dragon and Rares + Other stuff, Multi)[/li] [li]Sea Troll Queen[/li] [li]Kalquite Queen, (Drops: Slayer Helmet, Dragon Hai, Dragon and Rares + Other stuff, Multi)[/li] [li]Chaos Elemental[/li] [li]Dagannoth Kings[/li] [li]Blue + Metal Dragons[/li] [li]Tormented Demons[/li][/ul]
+ Lots more!
Slayer has been made easyer, 1 kill of a slayer task = level 50-60 Slayer, so you can get your Whips faster!
There's so much to do, so all were asking is one, just one chance from you! I guarentee you'll love ChronicleX.

item.title: ChronicleX - Re-birth
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[center][/center]

I know i’ll get flammed for doing this, but oh well.

So umm, as you may or may not know the re-birth of ChronicleX has begun.
We’ve already bought the VPS and were already Webclient setup.

[size=10pt]Features[/size]

[ul][li]Vps Hosted (24/7)[/li]
[li]Active Staff[/li]
[li]Tonnes of Monsters to battle against[/li]
[li]Tonnes of Minigames to play![/li]
[li]An epic on-growing Community[/li]
[li]A hot Economy, fair and fun![/li]
[li]Constant Updates[/li]
[li]A great Thieveing System, 15-30-50k[/li]
[li]Perfected Chaotic Weapons - Maul, LongSword and Staff[/li]
[li]Perfected Pvp Armours and Weapons 100% working with effects[/li]
[li]Perfected Dragon Claws 100% working with Special Attack[/li]
[li]100% Curse Prayers with fully working effects like RuneScape[/li]
[li]Sensationl Combat[/li]
[li]Npc Freezing[/li]
[li]Easy but fun training![/li]
[li]Perfected Ep System for more of a Pking experience[/li][/ul]

[size=10pt]Minigames[/size]

[ul][li]Barrows[/li]
[li]Duel Arena[/li]
[li]Fight Pits[/li]
[li]Fight Caves - Jad 1 wave[/li]
[li]PestControl[/li]
[li]Warriors Guild[/li][/ul]

[size=10pt]Bosses[/size]

[ul][li]The almighty Barrelchester[/li]
[li]GodWars[/li]
[li]Corporal Beast[/li]
[li]KingBlackDragon[/li]
[li]Giant Mole, (Drops: Slayer Helmet, Dragon Hai, Dragon and Rares + Other stuff, Multi)[/li]
[li]Sea Troll Queen[/li]
[li]Kalquite Queen, (Drops: Slayer Helmet, Dragon Hai, Dragon and Rares + Other stuff, Multi)[/li]
[li]Chaos Elemental[/li]
[li]Dagannoth Kings[/li]
[li]Blue + Metal Dragons[/li]
[li]Tormented Demons[/li][/ul]

  • Lots more!

Slayer has been made easyer, 1 kill of a slayer task = level 50-60 Slayer, so you can get your Whips faster!

There’s so much to do, so all were asking is one, just one chance from you!
I guarentee you’ll love ChronicleX.
